entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company that provides graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units for the mobile computing and automotive market.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox is a company acquired by NVIDIA Corporation, which contributed to the prior year gross unrecognized tax benefits.

entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The Board of Directors of NVIDIA Corporation authorized the repurchase of the company's stock and approved the retirement of treasury shares.

relationships.relationship_description: Mellanox was acquired by NVIDIA Corporation and contributed to the prior year gross unrecognized tax benefits.
The Board of Directors of NVIDIA Corporation authorized the repurchase of the company's stock and approved the retirement of treasury shares.
